name: Tiny Grove
description:
The yearly celebration for Tiny Grove's forest guardian has come, and it's up to you to gather all the creatures of the forest to get this party started!

Play the right tunes to lead the different types of forest inhabitants through the grove, solve puzzles along the way and make sure no one gets let behind. If you bring everybody together, the celebration is sure to be a success!

Created during the Games Master game jam at HAW Hamburg, March 2023.

Made by Leander Pieters, Leanna Geideck, Rouven Cabanis and Sören Klante.

Music by Adrian Hense.
